definition: to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
(TCM) to build up one's kidney yang/to boost male sex drive
tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)
to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
